sentences.english: Anexpensive brassiere will cost less than an expensive handbag.
sentences.chinese: 一款高檔胸罩比一個高檔手袋花費的要少得多。

sentences.english: Examine the seams of the sports bras.
sentences.chinese: 仔細檢查運動胸罩的縫合處。

sentences.english: Your bra band is too large.
sentences.chinese: 也許你的胸罩帶子太寬了。

sentences.english: Women need to get out of damp sports bras quickly.
sentences.chinese: 女人們需要快速脫掉浸溼的運動胸罩。

sentences.english: " Ballproof bust bodice " publish the proposal that comes from a policewoman.
sentences.chinese: “防彈胸罩”的出臺來自一名女警察的建議。

sentences.english: Don't constrict your breasts because of your shyness, and don't wear bra too early.
sentences.chinese: 不能因爲害羞而束胸，也不能過早佩戴胸罩。

sentences.english: You can air dry sports bras to prolong the life of the moisture-wicking fabrics.
sentences.chinese: 你可以風乾胸罩以延長防汗面料的使用壽命。

sentences.english: Select abra is very important for their own.
sentences.chinese: 選擇貳款適合自己的胸罩非常重要。

sentences.english: We have this teddy bra in black and red satin.
sentences.chinese: 我們有款用黑色和紅色緞子做的連身胸罩。

sentences.english: I am yet to see a bra with different cup sizes.
sentences.chinese: 我一直期望能見到一個左右罩杯不一樣的胸罩。

sentences.english: Wear a push-up bra (a gel bra or water bra works well, too). This will lift your breasts up.
sentences.chinese: 要戴一個撐起的胸罩，這樣就能把你的胸撐起來。

sentences.english: I've always worn an underwired bra.
sentences.chinese: 我經常穿著是帶鋼圈的胸罩。

sentences.english: Optional bra strap included for right side.
sentences.chinese: 弗倫奇的胸罩帶子可包括了右邊。

sentences.english: Every bra comprises 14 to 30 individual pieces.
sentences.chinese: 每一件胸罩，由14到30個單獨組件組成。

sentences.english: "Miley" Cyrus is nude and controversial, "flashing" a bra.
sentences.chinese: 麥莉賽勒斯是裸體和有爭議的，閃爍著胸罩。
